name: Orichalcum Pulse
desc: On switch-in, summons Sunny Day. During Sunny Day, Attack is 1.3333x.
shortDesc: On switch-in, summons Sunny Day. During Sunny Day, Attack is 1.3333x.

flavorText.sv: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.
